R

radar - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The PowerUp radar is a power up that will grant the player the ability to see where the briefcase is.
Radar - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject
CS 141: Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving Professor: Edwin Rodríguez Programming Project This class, Radar, is an extension of the class, PowerUp, because this class needs to be able to read and take the methods to be used in this class to function properly.
Radar() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Radar
 
radarGained() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The radarGained method is called when the player picks up the radar.
radarGainedCheck() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The radarGainedCheck method checks the object whether or not it has been used by the player or not.
radarOverridenCheck() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The radarOverridenCheck method will check if the power up's location is an Empty Member or not, then recreate the power up and put it back where it belongs
radarPosition - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The array radarPosition holds the location of the radar when it initially spawns
recieveWinFromGrid() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
This method gets information from the GameEngine.grid to check if the player has won the game yet.
resetLookAroundUsed() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
This method resets the boolean value to false when the player's turn is started, so that the player can use the look around ability.
resetPlayerInSight() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.NinjaOctopi
Used to set NinjaOctopi.playerInSight to false.
resetPlayerSeeAround() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
resetPlayerSeeAround method take the adjacent cell to the player and change the boolean of the adjacent cell into false, making it so the cell isn't seen.
resetSee() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.EmptyMember
The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
resetSee() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Entity
The resetSee method is called to keep something from being seen.
resetSee() - Method in interface edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.GridMember
The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
resetSee() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.PowerUp
The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
resetSee() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Room
The resetSee method is empty here because the room is always visible to the player no matter what happens.
resetSeeAll() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The resetSeeAll method will change the boolean of all Grid Members to false causing the player to not see further than they should be able to.
Room - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject
The Room class implements the GridMember and Serializable interfaces.
Room() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Room
 
runAllChecks() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The runAllChecks method will call the check methods for each of the power up, the check methods check the objects whether or not they have been used by the player.
